name: Stage Fright (itch) (MissingTech)
description:
Waves of bats and slimes invade the stage of your latest performance! You must protect the audience by using your handy spotlight and candles to demolish the monsters. 

The spotlight follows your mouse and shining it's light on the enemies will kill them. The only catch? The stage is pitch black and so you must use your trusty candles to illuminate areas of the stage.
